Posts.Content: lesliecusana wrote: Feeling so anxious! First Mom was diagnosised earlier this month with Stage 4 IDC That sucked! So inspired me to get my 1st mamogram @ age 44 sham on me! But that showed 15mm Cluster of microcalcifications! Was called back for more view but said to heck with that and went to mom's Breast specialist and he did a sterotactic biopsy Thurs. and just waiting for results! I know typically they are begnin but with everything happening this month it's freaking me out a bit! Dx 10/28/2013, <1cm, Stage IA, 0/3 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Radiation Therapy 1/12/2014 Breast Targeted Therapy 4/30/2014 Herceptin (trastuzumab) Chemotherapy 4/30/2014 Taxol (paclitaxel) Surgery 4/22/2015 Reconstruction (left); Reconstruction (right): Fat grafting Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Worried biopsy pending! lesliecusana Ariom

Posts.Content: lesliecusana wrote: I feel like I'm always waiting for result of something! First was 1st mamo 10/13 result then stereo biopsy, then BRCA result and now final path from lumpectomy 11/2013! Also now waiting for moms BRCA due to my result being BRCA variant ambiguous! mom was diagnosed Sept 2013 stage 4 Idc! So this is all new! But waiting sucks! In the mean time I'm helping mom get thru chemo! Dx 10/28/2013, <1cm, Stage IA, 0/3 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Radiation Therapy 1/12/2014 Breast Targeted Therapy 4/30/2014 Herceptin (trastuzumab) Chemotherapy 4/30/2014 Taxol (paclitaxel) Surgery 4/22/2015 Reconstruction (left); Reconstruction (right): Fat grafting Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Waiting on path after LX lesliecusana lesliecusana
